TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SqlRowsCopiedEventHandler(object sender, SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SqlRowsCopiedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs"> object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied"> event of a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>.
